title: Make ConcurrentUpdateSolrClient create RemoteSolrException instead of just SolrException for remote errors
description: Also, improve the exception message to include the remote error message when present. Specially when Solr is logging these errors (e.g. DistributedUpdateProcessor), this should make it easier to understand that the error was in the remote host and not in the one logging this exception.
